text: Rydaz Redemption is the debut album by rapper Mr. Envi'. It was released on August 23, 2011. ==Track listing== #Intro -- 1:00 #I'mma Boss -- 3:55 #In Tha Streets (featuring J.B. & Money) -- 3:02 #Lavish (featuring Blade) -- 3:35 #I Just Wanna (featuring Truehillz & S.G. -- 3:35 #Spotlight -- 3:00 #Cold Outside -- 4:10 #I Be On Tha Block (featuring Blade) -- 3:30 #Gettin' To Tha Paper (featuring Mista T, Fuol, S.G., Mayjor & Bigg Redd) -- 4:00 #Do Tha Thang (featuring S.G. & Keyki') -- 4:44 #Boss Shit (featuring Money) -- 4:50 #Get At Me -- 3:25 #Do It Big (featuring S.G. & Bigg Redd) -- 4:28 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2011 debut albums Category:Mr. Envi' albums
title: Rydaz Redemption
